DOC.detailed_description: This study randomize control trial . Youth present emergency department intentional injury ( gunshot wound , stab wound , assault ) give behavioral assessment . Participants categorize accord risk ( low , moderate , high ) . Only moderate high youth continue study randomize . Low risk youth receive medical standard care re-assessed 18 month . Randomization place participant one two arm . Arm 1 receive standard care PLUS brief intervention AIM outreach worker . Arm 2 receive standard medical care PLUS brief intervention PLUS case management . Every randomized youth assess risk protective factor data collect 6-month interval ( 0 , 6 , 12 , 18 month ) .
